name: @openzeppelin/contracts-ui-builder-styles
description: Centralized styling system for the OpenZeppelin Contracts UI Builder.

scripts.build: echo 'No build step needed for styles'
scripts.lint: echo 'No JavaScript files to lint in styles package'
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'No JavaScript files to lint in styles package'
scripts.format: cd ../.. && pnpm exec prettier --write "packages/styles/**/*.{css,js,cjs}" --ignore-path .prettierignore --config .prettierrc && cd packages/styles
scripts.format:check: cd ../.. && pnpm exec prettier --check "packages/styles/**/*.{css,js,cjs}" --ignore-path .prettierignore --config .prettierrc && cd packages/styles

author: OpenZeppelin
